About Me

Because this is a Node.js application that runs from a machine and not a browser, we can't deploy this to GitHub pages. If anyone ever wants to look at the application, they'll have to clone it to their own local machine and run it from there, so it's really important you create a solid README.md file with instructions and explanations for how to use this application.
